speaker: elon
text: So, class, what's a Docker container, huh. Think of it like… a really fancy, self-contained apartment.

speaker: trump
text: It's like, a tiny apartment building, right. You can put anything in it,  huge success, the best apartment.

speaker: elon
text: No, Donald, it's more like…  your code lives in this self-contained unit. It has everything it needs –  the plumbing, the electricity, everything.

speaker: trump
text: It runs independently of the building, which is your operating system. So, like,  it’s totally secure,  nobody can touch it, right.

speaker: elon
